ability.name: Galaxy Shield-Blast
ability.description: Annie shields herself and blasts a cone of fire, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

ability.name: Orb of Deception
ability.description: Ahri fires an orb in a line dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through. It then returns to her, dealing true damage to all enemies it passes through.

ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
ability.description: Ashe fires and arrow toward the farthest enemy, colliding with the first enemy hit, dealing damage and stunning them. The stun lasts longer the farther the arrow travels.

ability.name: Mobilize the Fleet
ability.description: Aurelion Sol launches fighters, which fly out to random enemies, deal magic damage, and then return. Aurelion Sol launches all ready fighters plus 3 additional when he casts. Fighters prefer to target nearby enemies.

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.description: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 2.5 seconds. The next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second. Allies within range will prioritize attacking Blitzcrank's target.

ability.name: Ace in the Hole
ability.description: Caitlyn takes aim at the furthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

ability.name: Rupture
ability.description: Cho'Gath ruptures a large area, dealing magic damage and knocking up all enemies within.

ability.name: Space Pirate Guillotine
ability.description: Darius dunks an enemy, dealing magic damage. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again.

ability.name: Chronobreak
ability.description: Ekko shatters the timeline, freezing all units in time before attacking each enemy with bonus magic damage and applying on-hit effects.

ability.name: E.M.P.
ability.description: Ezreal fires an electromagnetic pulse at a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and increases the cost of their next spell cast by 40%.

ability.name: Reposte
ability.description: Fiora enters a defensive stance for 1.5 seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. As she exits this stance, she ripostes, dealing magic damage and stunning a nearby enemy.

ability.name: Chum the Waters
ability.description: Fizz throws a lure that attracts a shark, causing it to emerge after a brief delay. It deals magic damage to enemies caught, knocking them back and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Orbital Strike
ability.description: Gangplank calls down a large orbital strike around his target, dealing magic damage to all enemies in that area for 2 seconds.

ability.name: Smoke Grenade
ability.description: Graves launches a smoke grenade toward the highest attack speed enemy, which explodes on impact dealing magic damage to enemies in the area and causing their attacks to miss for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Bladesurge
ability.description: Irelia dashes past her target, attacking them for a percentage of her Attack Damage as she passes through. If this kills the target, she casts again immediately at the enemy with the highest mana.

ability.name: Ageless Standard
ability.description: Jarvan calls down his standard to a nearby location, granting nearby allies Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

ability.name: To the Skies!
ability.description: Jayce jumps into the air and slams his hammer, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: Whisper
ability.description: Passive: Jhin converts each 1% of bonus attack speed he has into .8 attack damage. Every fourth shot, Jhin deals bonus % attack damage.

ability.name: Get Excited!
ability.description: Passive: Jinx gets excited as she helps take down enemies.After her first takedown, Jinx gains bonus attack speed.

ability.name: Missile Rain
ability.description: Kai'Sa launches missiles towards each nearby enemy that deal 50 magic damage each.

ability.name: Inspire
ability.description: At the start of combat, Karma tethers to her closest ally. Karma shields the tethered ally, or random if the ally is dead for 4 seconds. While the shield holds, the ally receives bonus attack speed.

ability.name: Force Pulse
ability.description: Kassadin releases a wave of energy in front of him, dealing magic damage and disarming all targets hit.

ability.name: Ascend
ability.description: Kayle Ascends, causing her attacks to launch waves that deal bonus magic damage until the end of combat.

ability.name: Taste their Fear
ability.description: Kha'Zix slashes the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage. If the target has no adjacent teammates, this damage is increased.

ability.name: Cyber Barrier
ability.description: Leona creates a barrier, reducing all incoming damage by a flat amount

ability.name: Relentless Persuit
ability.description: Lucian dashes away from his current target, then Basic Attacks them and fires a second shot which deals magic damage.

ability.name: Mass Polymorph
ability.description: Lulu polymorphs the nearest enemies for 4 seconds, rendering them unable to attack or cast, and causing them to hop around aimlessly. Polymorphed enemies take additional damage.

ability.name: Lucid Binding
ability.description: Lux fires a sphere of darkness that passes through enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them.

ability.name: Energy Shield
ability.description: Passive: Malphite starts combat with a shield equal to a percent of his maximum health.

ability.name: Chosen One
ability.description: For 5 seconds, Master Yi gains massively increased movement speed, heals for a percentage of his maximum health each second, and deals bonus true damage with his Basic Attacks.

ability.name: Bullet Time
ability.description: Miss Fortune channels and fires waves of bullets in a cone for 2.25s, dealing a percentage of enemies' maximum health in magic damage over the duration

ability.name: Indestructible
ability.description: Mordekaiser gains a shield that absorbs damage. While the shield persists, Mordekaiser deals magic damage per second to all nearby enemies.

ability.name: Pop Blossom
ability.description: Neeko leaps into the air and slams into the ground, dealing magic damage and stunning all nearby enemies.

ability.name: Buckler Toss
ability.description: Poppy throws her buckler at the furthest enemy dealing damage. The buckler bounces back to Poppy, shielding her.

ability.name: Grand Entrance
ability.description: Rakan dashes next to his attack target then leaps into the air, knocking up and damaging all adjacent enemies.

ability.name: Flamespitter
ability.description: Rumble torches his enemies, dealing magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds, and reducing healing on them by 80% for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Deceive
ability.description: Shaco teleports and backstabs his target, critically striking for a percentage of his Basic Attack damage.

ability.name: Future's Refuge
ability.description: Shen creates a zone around himself for a few seconds, granting all narby allies 100% chance to dodge incoming basic attacks. While active, Shen gains Magic Resist.

ability.name: Aria of Perseverance
ability.description: Sona heals injured allies and cleanses them of all negative effects.

ability.name: Wish
ability.description: Soraka heals all allies.

ability.name: Unleashed Power
ability.description: Syndra pulls in all orbs on the battlefield and creates 3 new ones, then fires them all at the enemy with the highest health, dealing magic damage per orb.

ability.name: Temporal Passage
ability.description: Thresh tosses his lantern towards random unit(s) on your bench, pulling them into the current combat and granting them and himself bonus mana. Traits are unaffected.

ability.name: Wild Cards
ability.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal magic damage to each enemy they pass through.

ability.name: Lifeform Disintegration Ray
ability.description: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that sweeps across the battlefield over 2.5 seconds, dealing magic damage per second to enemies hit.

ability.name: Assault and Battery
ability.description: Vi charges at the furthest enemy, knocking and dealing magic damage to all enemies along the way. When she reaches her target, she deals magic damage and knocks them up.

ability.name: Cyclone
ability.description: Wukong spins rapidly around, dealing magic damage to nearby units over 3 seconds. The first time Wukong hits each enemy, he knocks them into the air and stuns them.

ability.name: Deadly Plumage
ability.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades, gaining 100% Attack Speed for a few seconds.

ability.name: Three Talon Strike
ability.description: Xin Zhao quickly strikes his target three times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects. The third strike deals bonus magic damage and knocks his target up for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Last Breath
ability.description: Yasuo blinks to the enemy with the most items and knocks them up, holding them airborne for 1 second and hitting them multiple times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

ability.name: Bomb!
ability.description: Ziggs throws a bomb at an enemy, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
ability.description: Zoe kicks a bubble at the enemy with the highest health, dealing magic damage and stunning them.
